name: Space Trash Premium
description:
This game is premium version of Space Trash by Yabra: 

In Premium  version was added skin system.

In this game you have to play as a pilot of a ship who shoots at meteorites, trying not to let them pass by.

More info you can get in files "info.txt" and "info_rus.txt"

You can contact the creator of the game at the email address SpaceTrashGame@yandex.ru
